components.title: ATS Readability
components.explanation: Measures how easily automated screeners can read your resume.
helpedBy: Most formatting and parsing rules are met.

components.title: Skill Match
components.explanation: Compares your listed skills to the job requirements.
helpedBy: Several skills align with the job description.

components.title: Experience Relevance
components.explanation: Looks for clear, measurable impact in your experience.
helpedBy: Some bullets already include measurable outcomes.
draggedBy: Several bullets need stronger results or metrics.

components.title: Resume Structure
components.explanation: Checks layout, length, and section clarity.
helpedBy: Key sections are present and labeled.
